en.title: Complete Guide to First-Year Cat Ownership Costs: From Purchase Price to Initial Expenses
en.content:
How much does it cost in the first year of owning a cat? Here is a detailed breakdown by category.

Kitten Purchase Price

The price varies depending on the breed and pedigree. For Siberians, the typical range is 150,000 to 300,000 yen. Prices also differ between pet shops and breeders.

Initial Supply Costs

ItemEstimated Cost
Cage8,000-20,000 yen
Litter box + cat litter3,000-5,000 yen
Cat tree5,000-15,000 yen
Food and water bowls2,000-5,000 yen
Carrier bag3,000-8,000 yen
Bed and blanket2,000-5,000 yen
Toys1,000-3,000 yen
Scratching post500-2,000 yen
Total24,500-63,000 yen

First-Year Medical Costs

ItemEstimated Cost
Vaccinations (2-3 rounds)10,000-20,000 yen
Spay/neuter surgery15,000-30,000 yen
Microchip3,000-5,000 yen
Health checkup5,000-10,000 yen
Total33,000-65,000 yen

zh.title: 养猫第一年费用总结：从购买费到初始费用完全指南
zh.content:
迎接猫咪的第一年大概需要多少费用呢？以下按项目详细介绍。

幼猫购买费

根据猫种和血统有所不同。西伯利亚猫的市场价大约在15万至30万日元左右。宠物店和繁育人的价格区间也有差异。

初始用品费用

用品预估费用
笼子8,000-20,000日元
猫砂盆+猫砂3,000-5,000日元
猫爬架5,000-15,000日元
食碗和水碗2,000-5,000日元
猫包3,000-8,000日元
猫窝和毯子2,000-5,000日元
玩具1,000-3,000日元
猫抓板500-2,000日元
合计24,500-63,000日元

第一年医疗费

项目预估费用
疫苗接种（2-3次）10,000-20,000日元
绝育手术15,000-30,000日元
芯片植入3,000-5,000日元
健康检查5,000-10,000日元
合计33,000-65,000日元
